lead_paragraph: Kenneth Campbell repeatedly reported fake emergencies to dispatchers during February and March, the authorities said.

headline.print_headline: Queens Man Made Over 30 False Calls to 911,Officials Say
headline.main: Queens Man Accused of Making Over 30 False Calls to 911

snippet: Kenneth Campbell repeatedly reported fake emergencies to dispatchers during February and March, the authorities said.
abstract: Queens resident Kenneth Campbell is accused of making more than 30 false 911 calls in single month; if convicted on charges of making terroristic threat and false reporting of an incident, Campbell could face seven years in prison.
